ComicInfo.Title: Deathgarden
ComicInfo.Summary:
Falcon discovers Captain America seemingly dying of some kind of poison, and teams up with Spider-Man to find an antidote.
Note: This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, Captain America and the Time Warp!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:48:56. [Issue ID 32428]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
